content:
Wartrance 或 War Trance 是一种Trance音乐子流派，大约诞生于 2007 年，主要使用到来自 trance 的元素以及少量 Techno 的元素，其主要的特征是使用二战期间事件的声音和环境元素，混合阿道夫·希特勒、约瑟夫·斯大林、东条英机、约瑟夫·戈培尔、贝尼托·墨索里尼、伊奥尼斯·梅塔克萨索等领导人的声音，以及包括轰炸机、大炮、导弹发射器、武器、爆炸等的真实录音。这类音乐的主题钟往往含有明显的仇外心理、种族主义、法西斯主义和新纳粹主义元素。

 

尽管Wartrance风格非常多样化并且倾向于混合，其曲速范围在大约 125 到 200 BPM 之间波动，并且倾向于与其他子流派糅合，例如 Tech trance、New Beat、Vocal trance、Digital hardcore、Hardcore techno 等。由于相关艺术家不同的创作或制作技术方式，用某种一般特性来归类Wartrance很复杂，但它仍有一些共通的主要形式，例如描绘战争或诸如大屠杀之类的悲惨事件，是这类风格探讨的最终目标，即展示如何通过战争和Trance的情绪（仇恨、骄傲、悲伤、遗憾），来打造一系列新感觉（例如欣快或宽宏大量），让听众从历史上回到事实，感受战争中Wartrance中的状态。尽管Wartrance的受欢迎程度不高，但它仍提供了无限的可能性。
contentEn:
The Wartrance or War Trance is a musical microgenre that was born in approximately 2007 and that uses mostly the elements of trance and to a lesser extent of techno , its great particularity is due to the vocal and environmental use of events during World War II by mixing voices of leaders such as Adolf Hitler , Joseph Stalin , Mao Zedong , Hideki Tojo , Joseph Goebbels , Benito Mussolini , Ioannis Metaxasor by the inclusion of real recordings of bomber planes, cannons, missile launchers, weapons, explosions, etc. His biggest criticism lies in his apparent propaganda constitution of xenophobia, racism, fascism and neo-Nazism.

 

Although his style is very diverse and he tends to mix , his range oscillates between approximately 125 and 200 PPM and he tends to work normally with other subgenres such as Tech trance , New Beat , Vocal trance , Digital hardcore , Hardcore techno among many others. that it is complex to classify it within a generic particularity either because of the varied creations by its artists or because of the technical elements that emerge, however wartrance does not skimp in its main form such as war or tragic events such as the holocaust, that is the ultimate goal of the genre, which is to demonstrate how through war and trance emotions (of hatred, pride, sadness, regret) can manage a whole range of new feelings (such as euphoria or magnanimous) in the one that man, that allow him to go back historically to the facts and this returns of itself to the war trance endless possibilities to offer despite its precarious popularity.

 

Artists

  • DJ Ghost of the Reich.
  • Dj Adolf.
  • Dj Himmler.
  • Dj 1933.
  • Dj Nazi Scum.
  • Dj Panzerfaust.
  • Dj Chancellor.
  • Dj Stalin
  • Dj Revolution
remarks:
本词条汉字内容由 @多频百科团队 翻译+编辑
原文译自 https://second.wiki/wiki/wartrance

originalStyle: Trance, ambient, New Beat, techno, classic trance, vocal trance tech trance, hardcore techno, digital hardcore, vocal trance.
deriveStyle: Nazi Techno/Trance, Soviet Techno/Trance, Socialist Trance
